tasks.title: VAD-based Chunked Streaming
tasks.description: Implement VAD-based chunking to improve long audio accuracy. Process audio in natural speech segments (on each VAD.onSpeechEnd) and concatenate transcriptions incrementally.

tasks.title: Active Window Context
tasks.description: Capture active window context (App Name, Window Title, Bundle ID) to improve transcription relevance.

tasks.title: Settings UI
tasks.description: Implement Settings UI for Model Selection (Turbo vs Large) and Microphone Sensitivity.

tasks.title: Onboarding Flow
tasks.description: Implement onboarding flow for Microphone and Accessibility permissions.
